tool.name: Remove Annotation Feature
tool.description: that's unused in our GFF tools
tool.help:
**What it does**
For an input GFF3, this tool specifically removes the remark/annotation features as needed for compatibility with certain tools.
Example input:: Miro annotation remark 1 167935 . . . gff-version=3;sequence-region=%28%27Miro%27%2C 0%2C 172788%29
Example output:: Miro . . 1 167935 . . . gff-version=3;sequence-region=%28%27Miro%27%2C 0%2C 172788%29
